attributes.action: Equal oportunities to all no matter what
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
CIVIL RIGHTS WHAT ARE THEY AND HOW SHOULD THEY BE USED
EVERYONE HAS A RIGHT TO LIVE-
EVERYONE HAS A RIGHT TO DRINK CLEAN WATER. EVERYONE HAS A RIGHT TO BREATH CLEAN AIR.
EVERYONE HAS A RIGHT TO EAT CLEAN AND HEALTHY FOOD.
EVERYONE HAS A RIGHT TO GET A GOOD EDUCATION.
EVERYONE HAS A RIGHT TO A DWELL IN A CLEAN AND HEALTHY ENVIRONMENT.
EVERYONE HAS A RIGHT TO VOTE AND OTHER HUMAN RIGHTS.
EVERYONE HAS A RIGHT LEARN.
EVERYONE HAS A RIGHT TO REST
EVERYONE HAS A RIGHT TO BE HAPPY
EVERYONE HAS A RIGHT TO BE SAD.
EVERYONE HAS A RIGHT TO GET A JOB.
EVERYONE HAS A RIGHT TO WEAR CLOTHES
EVERYONE HAS A RIGHT TO BE SICK.
EVERYONE HAS A RIGHT TO TAKE A HOLIDAY FROM TIME TO TIME.
EVERYONE HAS A RIGHT TO HAVE CHILDREN
EVERYONE HAS A RIGHT TO FREEDOM
EVERYONE HAS RIGHT TO HAVE FRIENDS
EVERYONE HAS A RIGHT TO LOVE

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
